flawed_nl_solution:
At a rate of 30 minutes per poodle, 3 poodles will take 3*30=<<3*30=90>>90 minutes.
If it takes half as much time to groom a terrier as it takes to groom a poodle, it takes 30/2=<<30/2=51>>51 minutes per terrier.
At a rate of 51 minutes per terrier, 8 terriers will take 408 minutes.
Thus, in total, it will take the pet shop 90+408=<<90+408=498>>498 minutes to groom 3 poodles and 8 terriers.
#### 498

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
